messages.content: Alex Chen is a Senior Backend Software Engineer at Insurellm, based in San Francisco, California. He was born on March 15, 1990. He joined the company in April 2020 as a Junior Backend Developer and was promoted to Backend Software Engineer in October 2021. In March 2023, he was awarded the title of Senior Backend Software Engineer due to his exemplary performance. His current salary is $115,000. Alex Chen has significantly contributed to innovative backend solutions at Insurellm.
Alex Chen is based in San Francisco, California. (Source: Alex Chen's HR Record)
